mapper.select: SELECT obi.oid,obi.ord_no,obi.creator_name,obi.creator_phone,obi.city_name, s.store_id,s.store_name,obd.id,obd.freight FROM ord_base_info obi LEFT JOIN ord_billing_details obd on obi.oid = obd.oid LEFT JOIN st_store s ON obi.store_id = s.store_id WHERE obi.delivery_type="HOUSE_DELIVERY" AND obi.status="UNPAID" ORDER BY obi.create_time DESC

SELECT obi.oid,obi.ord_no,obi.creator_name,obi.creator_phone,obi.city_name, s.store_id,s.store_name,obd.id,obd.freight FROM ord_base_info obi LEFT JOIN ord_billing_details obd on obi.oid = obd.oid LEFT JOIN st_store s ON obi.store_id = s.store_id WHERE obi.store_id = #{storeId} AND obi.delivery_type="HOUSE_DELIVERY" AND obi.status="UNPAID" ORDER BY obi.create_time DESC

SELECT obi.oid,obi.ord_no,obi.creator_name,obi.creator_phone,obi.city_name, s.store_id,s.store_name,obd.id,obd.freight FROM ord_base_info obi LEFT JOIN ord_billing_details obd on obi.oid = obd.oid LEFT JOIN st_store s ON obi.store_id = s.store_id WHERE obi.city_id = #{cityId} AND obi.delivery_type="HOUSE_DELIVERY" AND obi.status="UNPAID" ORDER BY obi.create_time DESC

SELECT obi.oid,obi.ord_no,obi.creator_name,obi.creator_phone,obi.city_name, s.store_id,s.store_name,obd.id,obd.freight FROM ord_base_info obi LEFT JOIN ord_billing_details obd on obi.oid = obd.oid LEFT JOIN st_store s ON obi.store_id = s.store_id WHERE ( obi.ord_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryOrderInfo},'%') OR obi.creator_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryOrderInfo},'%') OR obi.creator_phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryOrderInfo},'%') ) AND obi.delivery_type="HOUSE_DELIVERY" AND obi.status="UNPAID" ORDER BY obi.create_time DESC

SELECT obi.oid,obi.ord_no,obi.creator_name,obi.creator_phone,obi.city_name, s.store_id,s.store_name,obd.id,obd.freight,obi.remark,obi.create_time, oli.receiver,oli.receiver_phone,oli.shipping_address, ogi.id as or_id, ogi.sku , ogi.sku_name, ogi.return_price, ogi.order_qty FROM ord_base_info obi LEFT JOIN ord_billing_details obd on obi.oid = obd.oid LEFT JOIN st_store s ON obi.store_id = s.store_id LEFT JOIN ord_logistics_info oli ON oli.oid = obi.oid LEFT JOIN ord_goods_info ogi ON ogi.oid= obi.oid WHERE obi.oid = #{id} AND obi.delivery_type="HOUSE_DELIVERY" AND obi.status="UNPAID" ORDER BY obi.create_time DESC

SELECT obi.oid,obi.ord_no,obi.creator_name,obi.creator_phone,obi.city_name, s.store_id,s.store_name,obd.id,obd.freight FROM ord_base_info obi LEFT JOIN ord_billing_details obd on obi.oid = obd.oid LEFT JOIN st_store s ON obi.store_id = s.store_id WHERE obi.oid = #{id} AND obi.delivery_type="HOUSE_DELIVERY" AND obi.status="UNPAID" ORDER BY obi.create_time DESC

SELECT obi.ord_no,obi.creator_name,obi.city_name, s.store_id,s.store_name,ofcl.modifier,ofcl.modify_time, ofcl.freight_change_before,ofcl.freight_change_after,ofcl.freight_change_amount FROM ord_base_info obi LEFT JOIN st_store s ON obi.store_id = s.store_id RIGHT JOIN ord_freight_change_log ofcl ON obi.oid = ofcl.oid WHERE obi.delivery_type="HOUSE_DELIVERY" AND obi.status="UNPAID" ORDER BY ofcl.modify_time DESC
